root.name: Gribbly's Day Out
root.description: Gribbly's Day Out is 1985 game by Andrew Braybrook for C64. Set on the planet Blabgor, Gribbly Grobbly must rescue (collect) errant 'gribblets' from the landscape and return them to safety. The game is notable for the unusual and imaginative life cycle of enemy creatures which attempt to harm the defenseless gribblets.
